prayer: Jesus, I offer You my heart and my life. May my actions today reflect Your love and truth.
Father, I thank You for Your constant presence in my life. I trust in Your divine plan and ask for Your strength to live it out.
Lord, I thank You for Your grace and mercy. May Your presence be with me today and every day.
O Lord, I am not worthy that You should enter under my roof, but only say the word and my soul shall be healed. Amen.

I believe in God, the Father almighty, Creator of heaven and earth, and in Jesus Christ, His only Son, our Lord, who was conceived by the Holy Spirit, born of the Virgin Mary, suffered under Pontius Pilate, was crucified, died, and was buried; He descended into hell; on the third day He rose again from the dead; He ascended into heaven, and is seated at the right hand of God the Father almighty; from thence He will come to judge the living and the dead. Amen.
Lord, help me to forgive others as You have forgiven me. Grant me a heart of mercy and compassion.
Holy Spirit, come and fill my heart. Enlighten me with Your wisdom and lead me closer to the will of God.

Lord, make me an instrument of Your peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love; where there is injury, pardon; where there is doubt, faith; where there is despair, hope; where there is darkness, light; where there is sadness, joy. Amen.
Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us and help us to follow Your example of faith, love, and obedience to God.
Lord, help me to love others as You have loved me. May I be a light in this world, showing Your love and grace to those around me.
Lord Jesus Christ, Son of the Living God, have mercy on me, a sinner.
O my Jesus, forgive us our sins, save us from the fires of hell, lead all souls to heaven, especially those who are most in need of Thy mercy. Amen.

Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy Name; Thy kingdom come; Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread. And forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive those who trespass against us. And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil. Amen.
Angel of God, my guardian dear, to whom God's love commits me here, ever this day be at my side, to light and guard, to rule and guide. Amen.
Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit, as it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be, world without end. Amen.
Lord, I surrender all that I am to You. Take my life and use it for Your glory.
Lord, thank You for this new day. Help me to make the most of it. May I live today in Your service.
Lord Jesus, I seek Your guidance today. Help me to walk in Your truth and light.
Sacred Heart of Jesus, I place all my trust in Thee.
O Mary, conceived without sin, pray for us who have recourse to thee.
Father, You are my strength and refuge. I place my trust in You. Help me to carry out Your will today.
Jesus, I trust in You. Guide me through this day and give me strength to do Your work.
Lord, I place all my worries and fears into Your hands. Grant me peace and trust in Your provision.
Holy Spirit, fill me with Your love and peace. May I be a vessel for Your grace and mercy.
Eternal rest grant unto them, O Lord, and let perpetual light shine upon them. May they rest in peace. Amen.
Lord, I offer You my thoughts, words, and actions today. Help me to live in such a way that others may see You in me.
O Lord, You are my God; I will exalt You and praise Your name, for in perfect faithfulness You have done marvelous things, things planned long ago.
Father, I am here today in Your presence, trusting that You hear my prayer. I believe in Your power and grace.

Hail Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee; blessed art thou among women, and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus. Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our death. Amen.
Lord, I trust You in all things. May Your will be done in my life today and always. Amen.
